Poison Arrow.name: Ядовитая стрела
Poison Arrow.description: Нет мгновенного урона. При попадании цель должна пройти проверку сопротивления пыткам/препаратам СЛ13. При неудаче, цель получает 2d6 урона по ПЗ. Не повреждает броню.

Chainmail Armor (Body).name: Chainmail Armor (Body)
Chainmail Armor (Body).description: Medium version of an Armorjack. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Chainmail Armor (Head).name: Chainmail Armor (Head)
Chainmail Armor (Head).description: Medium version of an Armorjack for your head. -2 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Full Plate Armor (Body).name: Full Plate Armor (Body)
Full Plate Armor (Body).description: Metal plated armor to resist the most powerful hits. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Full Plate Armor (Head).name: Full Plate Armor (Head)
Full Plate Armor (Head).description: Metal plated armor to resist the most powerful hits to your head. -4 to REF, DEX, and MOVE.

Leather Armor (Head).name: Leather Armor (Head)
Leather Armor (Head).description: Simple Leather armor for your head. No armor penalty.

Shield.name: Щит
Shield.description: Requires an arm and has HP that is reduced by damage.

Studded Leather Armor (Head).name: Studded Leather Armor (Head)
Studded Leather Armor (Head).description: Standard Kevlar for your head. No armor penalty.

Vial of Poison.name: Ампула с ядом
Vial of Poison.description: 2d6 урона при провале проверки сопротивления пыткам/препаратам. Броня не учитывается.

Bow.name: Лук
Bow.description: A revitalized bow, reloaded as part of an Attack Action.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: A japanese wooden pole with a curved blade on one side. Favoured by Arasaka tactical teams for close engagements.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A hollow cylinder, typically made of metal or fiberglass. It may have conveyed fluids once.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: Useful as both a tool and a weapon. A rod of iron with split wedges on the ends.
